required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Observational Study of Dual and Triple Therapies Based on Pegasys (Peginterferon Alfa-2a) in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
clinical_study.official_title: Multi-Center, Non-Interventional Study, on the Efficacy of Dual and Triple Therapies Based on Pegylated Interferon Alfa-2a for the Treatment of Chronic Hepatitis C Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This multi-center, observational study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of dual and triple therapies based on Pegasys (peginterferon alfa-2a) in patients with chronic hepatitis C. Patients receiving treatment with either Pegasys plus ribavirin or Pegasys plus ribavirin plus telaprevir/boceprevir will be observed for the duration of their treatment and for up to 24 weeks of follow-up.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Viral Response (SVR) at Week 24
primary_outcome.description: The overall SVR-24 rate was defined as percentage of participants with Hepatitis C Virus Ribonucleic Acid (HCV-RNA) levels < 50 International Units per MilliLiter (IU/mL) (as measured by Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR)) at 24 weeks post treatment completion.

secondary_outcome.description: SVR at Week 24 is compared by treatment group, type of infection, prior treatments and genotype.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With SVR at Week 24 According to the Demographic Characteristics
secondary_outcome.description: The overall SVR-24 rate was defined as percentage of participants with Hepatitis C Virus Ribonucleic Acid (HCV-RNA) levels < 50 International Units per MilliLiter (IU/mL) (as measured by Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR)) at 24 weeks post treatment completion. Number of participants analysed signifies participants who were evaluated for outcome measure. Data for this outcome measure was not summarized for each arm. Hence, data is reported for all participants.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Rapid Virologic Response (RVR) at Week 4
secondary_outcome.description: RVR was defined as HCV-RNA <50 IU/mL by Week 4

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Extended RVR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Week 4 and 12 for telaprevir group; Week 8 and 24 for boceprevir group
secondary_outcome.description: Extended RVR was defined as HCV-RNA <50 IU/mL at weeks 4 and 12 for participants treated with telaprevir; or at weeks 8 & 24 for participants treated with boceprevir. The assessment was performed in participants who received triple therapy in treatment arms 'Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin +Telaprevir' and 'Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Boceprevir'.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Complete Early Virologic Response (cEVR)
secondary_outcome.description: Complete early virologic response (cEVR) was defined as HCV-RNA <50 IU/mL by Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With End of Treatment Response (EoT)
secondary_outcome.description: End-of-Treatment (EoT) response was defined as HCV-RNA <50 IU/mL by the end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Virologic Relapse
secondary_outcome.description: Virologic relapse was defined as detectable HCV-RNA during the treatment-free follow-up period in participants with HCV-RNA <50 IU/mL at EoT.
The average amount of time a treatment was prescribed to participants.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Dose Modification of Peginterferon Alfa-2a
Time to First Dose Modification of Ribavirin
Time to First Dose Modification of Telaprevir/Boceprevir
Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.description: Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medicinal product, whether or not considered related to the medicinal product. Safety analysis included 2 additional participants in arm 'Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Telaprevir'. The safety parameters were analyzed by the treatment actually received by the participants.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Value of Hemoglobin in Participants With Treatment-Induced Anemia
Percentage of Participants With Treatment Regimen for HCV Treatment Induced Anemia
Percentage of Participants Who Had SVR at Week 24 With Dose Modifications
secondary_outcome.description: Participants with dose modifications who had achieved SVR at Week 24 were reported. Data was collected for all participants who had dose modification of Peginterferon alfa-2a, Ribavirin or Telaprevir/boceprevir in any of the treatment regimen during the study.

study_pop.textblock: Chronic hepatitis C patients initiating Pegasys-based treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age
- Chronic hepatitis C (all genotypes, na√Øve or treatment experienced, HCV mono-infected or HCV-HIV co-infected)
- Receiving either dual therapy (Pegasys plus ribavirin) or triple therapy (Pegasys plus ribavirin plus telaprevir/boceprevir)
- No contra-indications to Pegasys and ribavirin therapy or to treatment regimen containing protease inhibitor (telaprevir or boceprevir) as detailed in local Prescribing Information
- Quantitative serum HCV RNA by PCR test before initiation of treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hepatitis A/B co-infection
- Evidence of severe illness, active malignancy, or any other conditions which would make the patient, in the opinion of the investigator, unsuitable for the study
- Pregnant or breast-feeding women

facility.name: Rambam Medical Center; Gastroenterology - Liver Unit
Shaare Zedek Hospital Liver Unit; Liver Unit
Holy Family Medical Center; Liver Unit
Rebecca Sieff Medical Center; Liver Unit
Tel-Aviv Sourasky Medical Center; Liver Unit

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The study was conducted at 21 investigational centers in Israel.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: The study was consisted of 3 arms of treatments: 1. Dual therapy: Peginterferon alfa-2a & Ribavirin; 2. Triple therapy :Peginterferon alfa 2a & Ribavirin & Telaprevir; 3. Triple therapy: Peginterferon alfa 2a & Ribavirin & Boceprevir

group.title: Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin
group.description: Dual Therapy. Dosing and treatment duration of the dual therapy (Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin) were at the discretion of the Investigator in accordance with the current local prescribing information.

group.title: Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Telaprevir
group.description: Triple Therapy. Dosing and treatment duration of the triple therapy (Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Teleprevir) were at the discretion of the Investigator in accordance with the current local prescribing information.

group.title: Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Boceprevir
group.description: Triple Therapy. Dosing and treatment duration of the triple therapy (Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Boceprevir) were at the discretion of the Investigator in accordance with the current local prescribing information.

group.description: Participants for which Treatment Allocation Data is Unavailable.

outcome.description: Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medicinal product, whether or not considered related to the medicinal product. Safety analysis included 2 additional participants in arm 'Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Telaprevir'. The safety parameters were analyzed by the treatment actually received by the participants.
outcome.population: Safety Population. Included only participants who had received at least one dose of peginterferon alfa-2a plus ribavirin or peginterferon alfa-2a plus ribavirin plus telaprevir/boceprevir and had at least one post-baseline safety assessment.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Who Had SVR at Week 24 With Dose Modifications
outcome.description: Participants with dose modifications who had achieved SVR at Week 24 were reported. Data was collected for all participants who had dose modification of Peginterferon alfa-2a, Ribavirin or Telaprevir/boceprevir in any of the treatment regimen during the study.
outcome.population: mTRT population: includes all participants who had an HCV-RNA result ‚â•50 IU/mL at their last measurement prior to commencing CHC therapy; had received one of the study's combination therapies; the participants' treatment documentation was sufficient for assignment to treatment groups.

group.title: All Participants
group.description: Participants who had dual or triple therapy as part of their drug regimen at the discretion of the investigator in accordance with the local prescribing information at the time of the study.

measure.title: Percentage of Participants Who Had SVR at Week 24 With Dose Modifications
measure.description: Participants with dose modifications who had achieved SVR at Week 24 were reported. Data was collected for all participants who had dose modification of Peginterferon alfa-2a, Ribavirin or Telaprevir/boceprevir in any of the treatment regimen during the study.
measure.population: mTRT population: includes all participants who had an HCV-RNA result ‚â•50 IU/mL at their last measurement prior to commencing CHC therapy; had received one of the study's combination therapies; the participants' treatment documentation was sufficient for assignment to treatment groups.

analysis.groups_desc: Correlation with dose modification for Peginterferon alfa-2a.
analysis.method_desc: The p-value from chi-square is the difference between SVR achieved (yes/no) and dose modifications.
analysis.estimate_desc: phi-coefficient is a measure of the degree of association between two binary variables

analysis.groups_desc: Correlation with dose modification for Ribavirin.
analysis.method_desc: The p-value from chi-square is the difference between SVR achieved (yes/no) and dose modifications.
analysis.estimate_desc: phi-coefficient is a measure of the degree of association between two binary variables.

analysis.groups_desc: Correlation with dose modification for Telaprevir/boceprevir.
analysis.method_desc: The p-value from chi-square is the difference between SVR achieved (yes/no) and dose modifications.
analysis.estimate_desc: phi-coefficient is a measure of the degree of association between two binary variables.

reported_events.desc: The Safety Analysis population was defined to include only participants who had received at least one dose of a peginterferon alfa-2a plus ribavirin, or a peginterferon alfa-2a plus ribavirin plus telaprevir/boceprevir and had at least one post-baseline safety assessment. Safety analysis included 2 additional participants in arm 'Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Telaprevir'. The safety parameters were analyzed by the treatment actually received by the participants.

group.title: Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin
group.description: Dual Therapy. Dosing and treatment duration of the dual therapy (Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin) were at the discretion of the Investigator in accordance with the current local prescribing information.

group.title: Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin +Telaprevir
group.description: Triple Therapy. Dosing and treatment duration of the triple therapy (Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Teleprevir) were at the discretion of the Investigator in accordance with the current local prescribing information.

group.title: Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin + Boceprevir
group.description: Triple Therapy. Dosing and treatment duration of the triple therapy (Peginterferon Alfa-2a + Ribavirin +Boceprevir) were at the discretion of the Investigator in accordance with the current local prescribing information.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Study being conducted under this Agreement is part of the Overall Study. Investigator is free to publish in reputable journals or to present at professional conferences the results of the study but only after the first publication or presentation that involves the Overall Study. The Sponsor may request that Confidential Information be deleted and/or the publication be postponed in order to protect the Sponsor's intellectual property rights.
